ygData.subject: Re: Race
ygData.msgSnippet: First to become a shaman you want to decide ONE thing. You want to be evil or good? IMO if you would be evil (but I don t recomend it, unless your used to
ygData.messageBody:
First to become a shaman you want to decide ONE thing. You want to be evil
or good? IMO if you would be evil (but I don't recomend it, unless your used
to playing evil races) I would suggest a troll. I don't know if you would
really care but they have faster HP regeneration. I have not played a troll
but I think the ogres home city is not so great. They'res not much stuff to
fight and it would take longer to level. If youre good, then be a barbarian.
They have one of the BEST home cities I have ever been to. I was able to get
to level 11 in two days. And they have great things for even higher levels.


>From: "Blizzard" <blizzard15@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Shaman@onelist.com>, <EverQuest@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EverQuest] Race
>Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 17:12:53 -0500
>
>I am planning on making a shaman and I was wondering which you all think is
>the best. I want a race that will be the strongest at higher levels, not
>necessarily right away. Also if you could provide reasons it would help me
>even more. Thanks for your time.
>
>-Blizzard
